Your password must be at least 10 characters long and include:

- At least one lowercase letter (a-z)
- At least one number (0-9)

riskOfFunds: with anyone or risk your funds being stolen.

UpdateNoticeBullet1: 12 seeded secret recovery phrase backup opportunity will be given

UpdateNoticeBullet3: AkashicLink does not store nor collect your KeyPair, 12 seeded phrase or password.
